title: Don't get used to luxuries of staying in Chandigarh; if you don't perform you will be changed: Kejriwal warns Punjab ministers - The Tribune India
content:
1. Don't get used to luxuries of staying in Chandigarh; if you don't perform you will be changed: Kejriwal warns Punjab ministers  The Tribune India
  2. Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann Meets Newly Elected MLAs  NDTV
  3. Perform or perish, Arvind Kejriwal tells new ministers and MLAs in Punjab  The Indian Express
  4. Watch: Kejriwal warns new Punjab Ministers to fulfil targets set by Bhagwant Mann or get replaced  Hindustan Times
  5. "Bhagwant Mann Set Targets For Every Minister And If...": Arvind Kejriwal  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Ministers who do not perform will be changed, said the chief of the Aam Admi Party (AAP), Arvind Kejriwal, while addressing a virtual meeting with newly elected MLAs in Punjab on Sunday.
